TopicTitle: [1.2.1] Spacetux - Contract Pack: Unmanned Contracts, Rover Contracts, Grand Tours and Sprite Missions

>

> I've opened an issue with nightingale about this, the same problem is happening with the RoverMissions
> 
> 
> 
> 
> FYI, all my contract packs use the Spacetux company, so if you don't see a flying penguin (see my image on this post) then you don't have any of the contracts available.
> 

its good to know its not me or my mods causing the issue, thanks, good luck getting it sorted.

> Hm, the first two Grand Tours I got offered (tour of the outer planets/of all planets) both had an apparent requirement of landing on Jool (Vessel State: Destination: Jool; State: Landed)
> 
> 
>

> 

Yeah - same here.  Haven't been able to land on Jool since early early-access versions.

[@linuxgurugamer](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/129964-linuxgurugamer/)

Just curious if you ever plan on updating Grand Tours to 1.1.2 (and your SharedAssets utility dependency we talked about previously)? This isn't meant to bug you, I just wanted to know if this is being discontinued or not.

hello, i want to report a issue with capcom , contractconfigurator 1.6 since today and contract pack grand tours.

The "grand tours to all planets" is shown multiple times and generated every second the next in capcom ,so i have a few times the same contract. Mission Control does not show any contract of grand tours, maybe locked in my early career

edit: I think its not the conract pack. same with remote tech contracts. maybe its capcom?!

Thanks! I tried to upgrade my Ubuntu 14.04.4 to 16.04.1 but I had some catastrophic failure and now have to reinstall it from scratch. I won't be able to help you debug it for a few days...
The Unmanned contracts have been updated for the new version of Contract Configurator

The Rover missions have been updated for the new version of Contract Configurator.

There may still be problems, please make sure you are using the latest version of Contract Configurator and the latest version of this contract pack before reporting problems.

Using the latest versions of both the Rover Pack and Contract Configurator. I'm also using the Unmanned Pack. The Unmanned Pack contracts are showing in the "All" list. However, the Rover Pack contracts aren't showing up. They were prior to the update.
